alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 1:12AM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 to 65 mph expected. Isolated gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down numerous tree limbs, as well as scattered trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
